item.title: Need Help My Npcs Are Not Dieing!
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

Npc dieing void but too lazy to search maybe I’ll do it I don’t know. yawn

You got luck Im in a good mood

in NPCHandler

[code] public void newNPC(int npcType, int x, int y, int heightLevel, int rangex1, int rangey1, int rangex2, int rangey2, int WalkingType, int HP, boolean Respawns) {
// first, search for a free slot
int slot = -1;
for (int i = 1; i < maxNPCs; i++) {
if (npcs[i] == null) {
slot = i;
break;
}
}

	if(slot == -1) return;		// no free slot found
             if(HP <= 0) { // This will cause client crashes if we don't use this :) - xero
              HP = 50;
            }
	NPC newNPC = new NPC(slot, npcType);
	newNPC.absX = x;
	newNPC.absY = y;
	newNPC.makeX = x;
	newNPC.makeY = y;
	newNPC.moverangeX1 = rangex1;
	newNPC.moverangeY1 = rangey1;
	newNPC.moverangeX2 = rangex2;
	newNPC.moverangeY2 = rangey2;
	newNPC.walkingType = WalkingType;
	newNPC.HP = HP;
	newNPC.MaxHP = HP;
	newNPC.MaxHit = (int)Math.floor((HP / 10));
	if (newNPC.MaxHit < 1) {
		newNPC.MaxHit = 1;
	}
	newNPC.heightLevel = heightLevel;
            newNPC.Respawns = Respawns;
	npcs[slot] = newNPC;
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help My Npcs Are Not Dieing!
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

lilg101:

No, I dont think so anyway how to i change or at least check if its changed so i can See.

open your

npc.cfg and it should look like this

//----NpcID-----NpcName-------------------------combat--health npc = 0 Hans 0 0

search the name of the npc you want to change the hp of

like if white knights search it like this

white_knights put a underscore where the spaces in the name are

go to the second number and change it to the hp you want the npc to have

metal

Read full topic
